languages.text: "Домин'{name} фон Валанциус, смерть прошептала твое имя". {n}Длинный палец с металлическим когтем указывает на вас, и за костяными глазницами вы различаете мрачный взгляд убийцы.{/n} "Мы отрекаемся от Домин'Теодоры. Мы отрекаемся от данной ей клятвы". {n}Девушка достает изогнутый хищный клинок, и в тот же миг в руках у замерших фигур появляются такие же.{/n}

"Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name} фон Валанциус, смерть прошептала твое имя". {n}Длинный палец с металлическим когтем указывает на вас, и за костяными глазницами вы различаете мрачный взгляд убийцы.{/n} "Мы отрекаемся от Домин'Теодоры. Мы отрекаемся от данной ей клятвы". {n}Девушка достает изогнутый хищный клинок, и в тот же миг в руках у замерших фигур появляются такие же.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

"Enim'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}A long finger tipped with a metal claw is pointed at you, and behind the bone mask, you make out the grim gaze of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Enim'Theodora. We renounce our vow to her." {n}The young woman produces a curved dagger that makes you think of an animal of prey. At once, identical daggers appear in the hands of the still-standing figures.{/n}

"Enim'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Enim'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}The young woman pulls out a sinister dagger with a curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

We renounce our oath to her." {n}The young woman pulls out a sinister dagger with a curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister dagger with a curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

"Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

languages.text: « Domin'{name} von Valancius, la mort a murmuré votre nom. »{n}La jeune femme pointe sur vous un doigt doté d'une griffe métallique. Derrière le masque d'os, c'est le regard froid et sinistre d'un assassin qui vous dévisage.{/n} « Nous renions Domin'Théodora. Nous renonçons au serment qui nous liait à elle. » {n}Elle s'empare d'une lame incurvée menaçante, bientôt imitée par ses compagnons.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Domin'{name} von Valancius, la mort a murmuré votre nom. »{n}La jeune femme pointe sur vous un doigt doté d'une griffe métallique. Derrière le masque d'os, c'est le regard froid et sinistre d'un assassin qui vous dévisage.{/n} « Nous renions Domin'Théodora. Nous renonçons au serment qui nous liait à elle. » {n}Elle s'empare d'une lame incurvée menaçante, bientôt imitée par ses compagnons.{/n}

languages.text: «Domin'{name} von Valancius, la muerte ha susurrado su nombre». {n}La mujer tiene una garra de metal en su dedo delgado. La apunta en tu dirección y te observa tras su máscara de hueso con los ojos fríos y sombríos de una asesina.{/n} «Renegamos de Domin'Theodora. Renunciamos a nuestro juramento hacia ella». {n}Desenvaina una hoja curva, y armas similares aparecen repentinamente en las manos de sus compañeros inmóviles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name} von Valancius, la muerte ha susurrado su nombre». {n}La mujer tiene una garra de metal en su dedo delgado. La apunta en tu dirección y te observa tras su máscara de hueso con los ojos fríos y sombríos de una asesina.{/n} «Renegamos de Domin'Theodora. Renunciamos a nuestro juramento hacia ella». {n}Desenvaina una hoja curva, y armas similares aparecen repentinamente en las manos de sus compañeros inmóviles.{/n}

languages.text: “秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，死亡曾低语过你的名字。”{n}女人纤细的手指上戴着金属利爪。此刻，这位刺客正指向你所在的方向，骨质面具后面冰冷、严酷的目光死死地凝视着你。{/n}“我们与秘者西奥多拉断绝关系，我们放弃对她许下的誓言。”{n}她抽出一把造型可怖的曲刃。她那些一动不动的同伴，此刻手中也突然出现了类似的武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，死亡曾低语过你的名字。”{n}女人纤细的手指上戴着金属利爪。此刻，这位刺客正指向你所在的方向，骨质面具后面冰冷、严酷的目光死死地凝视着你。{/n}“我们与秘者西奥多拉断绝关系，我们放弃对她许下的誓言。”{n}她抽出一把造型可怖的曲刃。她那些一动不动的同伴，此刻手中也突然出现了类似的武器。{/n}
“秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，死亡曾低语过你的名字。”{n}女人纤细的手指上戴着金属利爪。此刻，这位刺客正指向你所在的方向，骨质面具后面冰冷、严酷的目光死死地凝视着你。{/n}“我们与秘者西奥多拉断绝关系，我们放弃对她许下的誓言。”{n}她抽出一把造型可怖的曲刃匕首。她那些一动不动的同伴，此刻手中也突然出现了类似的武器。{/n}

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。死があなたの名をささやきました」{n}その女性の細い指には金属の爪が嵌められている。彼女は指をあなたの方に向け、骨の仮面の奥から、暗殺者のような冷たく険しい目であなたを見つめた。{/n}「我々はドミン・シオドーラと縁を切る。彼女への誓いを放棄します」{n}彼女は刃の曲がった不吉な短剣を取り出すと、動かなかった仲間の手にも同じような武器が突然現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。死があなたの名をささやきました」{n}その女性の細い指には金属の爪が嵌められている。彼女は指をあなたの方に向け、骨の仮面の奥から、暗殺者のような冷たく険しい目であなたを見つめた。{/n}「我々はドミン・セオドラと縁を切る。彼女への誓いを放棄します」{n}彼女は刃の曲がった不吉な短剣を取り出すと、動かなかった仲間の手にも同じような武器が突然現れた。{/n}

「ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。死があなたの名をささやきました」{n}その女性の細い指には金属の爪が嵌められている。彼女は指をあなたの方に向け、骨の仮面の奥から、暗殺者のような冷たく険しい目であなたを見つめた。{/n}「我々はドミン・セオドラと縁を切る。彼女への誓いを放棄します」{n}彼女は刃の曲がった不吉な短剣を取り出すと、動かなかった仲間の手にも同じような武器が突然現れた。{/n}

languages.text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, der Tod hat Euren Namen geflüstert." {n}Eine metallene Klaue wurde über den schlanken Finger der Frau gestreift. Sie deutet damit auf dich und blickt von hinter ihrer Knochenmaske mit den kalten, dunklen Augen eines Assassinen an.{/n} "Wir enterben Domin'Theodora. Wir widerrufen unseren Eid ihr gegenüber." {n}Sie zückt eine bedrohliche gekrümmte Klinge. Ähnliche Waffen erscheinen urplötzlich in den Händen ihrer reglosen Gefährten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, death has whispered your name." {n}The woman's slender finger has been fitted with a metal claw. She points it in your direction, and gazes at you from behind her bone mask with the cold, grim eyes of an assassin.{/n} "We disown Domin'Theodora. We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}

languages.text: "Domin'{name} von Valancius, ölüm bize adını fısıldadı." {n}Kadının ince parmağına metalden bir pençe takılmış. Pençeyi sana doğrultup suikastçılara özgü soğuk ve acımasız gözlerini kemikten maskesinin ardından sana dikiyor.{/n} "Domin'Theodora'yı inkâr ediyoruz. Ona ettiğimiz yeminden dönüyoruz." {n}Kadın, kavisli bir pala çıkarıyor. Hareketsiz duran yoldaşlarının ellerinde de bir anda benzer silahlar beliriyor.{/n}

We renounce our oath to her." {n}She pulls out a sinister curved blade, and similar weapons suddenly appear in the hands of her motionless companions.{/n}
